message:
Our attorneys assist clients in a variety of issues, including : 

selection of the most appropriate type of legal entity,
incorporation and organisation of all types companies in Turkey,
opening branch of a company with foreign nationality,
sponsorship agreements, taking into account the optimization of each company's tax treatment in collaboration with tax specialists with whom we maintain a continued close relationship,
advise on all types of corporate issues, such as share capital structure,
corporate governance, board committees and organisational regulations and management of shareholders' relationships.
